thread.title: Ascension Episcopal/Vermilion Catholic Highlight Week 6 Games On Town Square Media
thread.title_full: Ascension Episcopal/Vermilion Catholic Highlight Week 6 Games On Town Square Media

author: Steve Peloquin
title: Ascension Episcopal/Vermilion Catholic Highlight Week 6 Games On Town Square Media
text:
Ascension Episcopal/Vermilion Catholic Highlight Week 6 Games On Town Square Media By Steve Peloquin October 9, 2015 6:28 AM Share on Twitter DENVER, CO – SEPTEMBER 23: The field is prepared as the Houston Texans face the Denver Broncos at Sports Authority Field at Mile High on September 23, 2012 in Denver, Colorado. The Texans defeated the Broncos 31-25. (Photo by Doug Pensinger/Getty Images) 

The big District 7-1A match-up between the 4th-ranked Ascension Episcopal Blue Gators, and the 5th-ranked Vermilion Catholic Screaming Eagles, highlight the four games that will be aired on our family on Town Square Media radio stations. 
Ascension Episcopal, who is unbeaten, at 5-0 on the year, will host their biggest game in their young history, when they welcome 4-1 Vermilion Catholic. 
You can hear the Ascension Episcopla/Vermilion Catolic game on Talk Radio 960 AM, and talkradio960.com . 
Also tonight, the Acadiana Wreckin’ Rams will be on the road to take on the Comeaux Spartans in a key District 3-5A contest. 
You can hear the Acadiana/Comeaux game on ESPN 1420, and espn1420.com. 
Meanwhile, on News Talk 96.5 KPEL-FM and kpel965.com tonight, we’ll have the Lafayette High/Barbe match-up. 
Finally, on Plent Radio 105.1 FM and planet1051.com we be airing the Lafayette Christian/Gueydan game. 
And remember, for all the scores, and analysis, log on to acadianapostgame.com throughout the evening.
